products.title: Clean Code
products.author: Robert C. Martin
products.description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn’t clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. Every year, countless hours and significant resources are lost because of poorly written code. But it doesn’t have to be that way.

products.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
products.author: Andrew Hunt
products.description: The authors begin by describing what patterns are and how they can help you design object-oriented software. They then go on to systematically name, explain, evaluate and catalog recurring designs in object-oriented systems. With Design Patterns as your guide, you will learn how these important patterns fit into the software development process and how you can leverage them to solve your own design problems most efficiently.

products.title: Design Patterns
products.author: Erich Gamma
products.description: The authors begin by describing what patterns are and how they can help you design object-oriented software.
